nodes.text: Pak'pah was a juicy, purple fruit that could only be grown on the planet Klatooine; scientists believed this was because of the wintrium found in Klatooine's soil. The pak'pah's skin had to be peeled before the fruit could be eaten. In 44 ABY, Sith apprentice Vestara Khai and Jedi Knight Ben Skywalker bought some pak'pah from Kelkad and his father, Barada, in the capital city of Treema on Klatooine.
